scenes.background: You suggested re-evaluating the tasks. [Bob] frowns slightly.
scenes.description: [Bob] crosses his arms and asks, 'So, which one do we prioritize now?'

options.text: Let's split up. Monica can handle the report while we work on the presentation.
options.analysis: You show good social skills by suggesting a clear division of labor, but empathy could be improved by considering Monicaâ€™s workload.

options.text: We should focus on the presentation first. The report can follow.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and empathy by prioritizing the presentation, but motivation might suffer due to the delayed report.

options.text: Maybe we should just get the report done quickly and then focus entirely on the presentation.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and empathy by suggesting to clear the report first, but emotional perception could be better as it might slow down the overall progress.
